attributes.action: give the taxpayer a referendum on the question of whether or not the taxpayer should be paying for the protection of the low level members of the royal family who wish to take foreign holidays with their protection group at our expense.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: There is no way the taxpayer should be paying for the protection of members of the royal family so far down the pecking order so as to be insignificant.
